translation.it: ...della lenta e inesorabile ascesa

translation.en: [DB] They're mutants.
translation.it: Sono mutanti.

translation.en: They're ninjas.
translation.it: Sono ninja.

translation.en: They're teenagers.
translation.it: Sono adolescenti.

translation.en: And they're turtles.
translation.it: E sono tartarughe.

translation.en: But this story starts with a different kind of shelled mutant.
translation.it: Ma la storia inizia con un altro mutante col guscio.

translation.en: Lobsters.
translation.it: Aragoste.

translation.en: And now, here is that story.
translation.it: E ora, ecco la storia.

translation.en: [Kevin] I grew up in a very small town in Maine.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto in una piccola città in Maine.

translation.en: I used to work cooking lobsters.
translation.it: Per lavoro cucinavo aragoste.

translation.en: [DB] But Kevin Eastman had no appetite for shellfish.
translation.it: Ma i crostacei a Kevin Eastman non piacevano.

translation.en: Bottom feeders. Anything that goes to the bottom, they eat it.
translation.it: Si mangiano tutto quello che finisce sul fondo.

translation.en: [DB] He consumed something else. [Kevin] I ate, slept, breathed comic books.
translation.it: - Gli piaceva altro. - Mangiavo, dormivo, respiravo fumetti.

translation.en: Daredevil, Captain America, Batman.
translation.it: Daredevil, Capitan America, Batman.

translation.en: But my favorite was Kamandi, The Last Boy on Earth,
translation.it: Ma soprattutto Kamandi, l'Ultimo Ragazzo sulla Terra.

translation.en: drawn by my hero, a guy named Jack Kirby.
translation.it: disegnato dal mio eroe Jack Kirby.

translation.en: He did Iron Man, and Hulk, and The Fantastic Four.
translation.it: Lavorò a Iron Man, Hulk, e i Fantastici Quattro.

translation.en: Jack Kirby is the artist's artist.
translation.it: Jack Kirby è l'artista dell'artista.

translation.en: He created what we know as comic book art today.
translation.it: Creò l'arte del fumetto per come la conosciamo.

translation.en: He broke the mold and changed things.
translation.it: Ruppe gli schemi e cambiò tutto.

translation.en: [DB] Including the career path of a young Kevin Eastman.
translation.it: Inclusa la carriera di un giovane Kevin Eastman.

translation.en: [KE] I told my parents, "I wanna be Jack Kirby when I grow up,
translation.it: Dissi ai miei "Da grande voglio essere Jack Kirby,

translation.en: I wanna be a comic book storyteller."
translation.it: un narratore a fumetti."

translation.en: And they just had this absolute mortified look.
translation.it: Sembravano assolutamente devastati.

translation.en: My dad said, "I'll help you with money for college,
translation.it: Mio padre disse: "Ti darò i soldi per studiare

translation.en: for any school except art school." [laughs]
translation.it: qualunque cosa ma non arte."

translation.en: [DB] Dejected, Kevin hit the road, chasing his dreams.
translation.it: Deluso, Kevin partì per inseguire i suoi sogni.

translation.en: It was a girl, yeah. You know?
translation.it: - Beh, in realtà... - Fu per una ragazza.

translation.en: [laughs] Women! [DB] Ending up in Dover, New Hampshire,
translation.it: - Donne! - Finì a Dover, New Hampshire,

translation.en: where Kevin would start a new relationship
translation.it: dove avrebbe iniziato una relazione...

translation.en: with this guy, which is good news for us.
translation.it: ...con questo tipo, per nostra fortuna.

translation.en: My name is Peter Laird.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Peter Laird.

translation.en: I had a gig with the local newspaper, the Daily Hampshire Gazette.
translation.it: Lavoravo con un quotidiano locale, la Daily Hampshire Gazette.

translation.en: It didn't pay that great and I had to draw all these things
translation.it: Non pagava tanto, e dovevo disegnare cose

translation.en: that I had no interest in drawing,
translation.it: che non mi interessavano,

translation.en: like tomato plants and vegetables.
translation.it: tipo pomodori e verdure.

translation.en: [DB] As Peter was drawing them, Kevin was packing them.
translation.it: Peter le disegnava, Kevin le imbustava.

translation.en: I was working, bagging groceries.
translation.it: Imbustavo la spesa per lavoro.

translation.en: [DB] But the fruit and vegetable aisle of destiny
translation.it: Ma il reparto frutta e verdura del destino

translation.en: had plans for these struggling artists, who decided to hang out.
translation.it: aveva altre idee per questi artisti, che finirono per conoscersi.

translation.en: And I invited him over to my house.
translation.it: Lo invitai a casa mia.

translation.en: The first thing I saw when I went through the door was a Jack Kirby original.
translation.it: La prima cosa che vidi quando entrai fu un originale di Jack Kirby.

translation.en: And I almost passed out.
translation.it: Quasi svenni.

translation.en: I had never seen a Jack Kirby original in my life.
translation.it: Non avevo mai visto un originale di Kirby.

translation.en: It just blew my mind, the power of his drawing
translation.it: Ero sconvolto dalla forza dei suoi disegni,

translation.en: in Fantastic Four and Thor, and The New Gods, Mister Miracle.
translation.it: nei Fantastici Quattro, Thor, I Nuovi Dei, Mister Miracle.

translation.en: It was like talking to someone with a completely like mind.
translation.it: Era come parlare con uno spirito affine.

translation.en: [Peter] That spark was wonderful. I'd never had that with anybody,
translation.it: Quella scintilla fu meravigliosa, non è mai successo con nessuno,

translation.en: before or since.
translation.it: né prima, né dopo.

translation.en: It was love at first sight.
translation.it: Amore a prima vista.

translation.en: [DB] Like a comic-book cupid, Jack Kirby had forged a bond...
translation.it: Come un Cupido fumettistico, Jack Kirby aveva creato un legame...

translation.en: I'll ink his pencils and he'll ink mine.
translation.it: Inchiostrerò le sue matite, e lui le mie.

translation.en: [DB] ...between a young Eastman and Laird,
translation.it: tra i giovani Eastman e Laird

translation.en: who moved in together
translation.it: che andarono a vivere assieme

translation.en: and fulfilled their dream of owning a comic book studio.
translation.it: realizzando il sogno di avere uno studio di fumetti.

translation.en: Mirage Studios.
translation.it: I Mirage Studios.

translation.en: [KE] That was our joke, Mirage was formed
translation.it: Era una battuta, si chiamava Mirage

translation.en: not in a studio, but our living room.
translation.it: perché in realtà era il salotto.

translation.en: [DB] With a fake-it-till-you-make-it business model,
translation.it: Con un modello di business improntato all'ottimismo,

translation.en: these maestros of mirage began polishing their portfolios.
translation.it: questi maestri del miraggio lucidarono i portfolio.

translation.en: We came up with this idea for this robot called the "Fugitoid."
translation.it: Avemmo l'idea di un robot chiamato "Fugitoid."

translation.en: I think we sent to like four or five different comic-book companies.
translation.it: La mandammo a quattro, cinque case editrici.

translation.en: Spent a lot of money on postage.
translation.it: Spendemmo un sacco in francobolli,

translation.en: And those companies spent a lot on postage, too,
translation.it: E anche le case editrici lo fecero,

translation.en: sending us rejection letters.
translation.it: per le lettere di rifiuto.

translation.en: That was fun.
translation.it: Fu divertente.

translation.en: [DB] It was starting to look like Eastman and Laird's dream of comic-book greatness
translation.it: Pareva che i sogni di gloria fumettistica di Eastman e Laird

translation.en: would vanish like a mirage.
translation.it: sarebbero svaniti come un miraggio.

translation.en: But then, late one night...
translation.it: E poi, una notte a tarda ora...

translation.en: We were in our living room that we pretended was a studio.
translation.it: Siamo nel nostro finto studio.

translation.en: We were being silly and he had the idea
translation.it: Facevamo i cretini, e lui ebbe l'idea

translation.en: that he was gonna draw something to make me laugh...
translation.it: di disegnare una cosa per farmi ridere.

translation.en: -and he drew this turtle. -[KE] He had a mask on. He had nun-chucks.
translation.it: - E disegnò una tartaruga. - Con la maschera e i nunchaku.

translation.en: I loved it and I drew my own version.
translation.it: Mi piacque e disegnai la mia versione.

translation.en: Then it made me laugh, ha ha.
translation.it: E mi fece ridere, ah ah.

translation.en: Then I said, "Well, if one, why not a group?"
translation.it: E dissi: "Perché non farne un gruppo?"

translation.en: -I inked it using a magic marker. -I penciled in this "ninja turtle" logo.
translation.it: - Le inchiostrai a pennarello. - Schizzai un logo: Tartarughe Ninja.

translation.en: [Peter] I added the "teenage mutant" to it.
translation.it: E io ci aggiunsi teenage mutant.

translation.en: [DB] And with that, Eastman and Laird stumbled upon an idea
translation.it: E così Eastman e Laird tirarono fuori un'idea

translation.en: that would send the world into shell shock.
translation.it: che avrebbe messo il mondo a guscio in giù.

translation.en: Well, eventually.
translation.it: Col tempo.

translation.en: After further developing the characters and story,
translation.it: Dopo aver sviluppato i personaggi e la storia,

translation.en: with limited resources,
translation.it: con risorse limitate,

translation.en: Eastman and Laird self-published their very first issue.
translation.it: Eastman e Laird autopubblicarono il primissimo numero.

translation.en: [Peter] 3,275 copies.
translation.it: Stampammo 3275 copie.

translation.en: [DB] Oh, and how did it go?
translation.it: Oh, e come andarono?

translation.en: I remember Pete calling up really excited, he said:
translation.it: Pete mi chiamò tutto eccitato e mi disse:

translation.en: That first printing sold out within days.
translation.it: La prima stampa andò esaurita in pochi giorni.

translation.en: We got pre-orders for 15,000 copies of the second issue.
translation.it: Ricevemmo 15.000 pre-ordini per il secondo numero.

translation.en: You know, double take.
translation.it: "Come, scusa?"

translation.en: [KE] I quit any other job I had.
translation.it: Mi licenziai da tutto il resto

translation.en: We started working full-time drawing comic books.
translation.it: e diventammo fumettisti a tempo pieno.

translation.en: I had become Jack Kirby, in my mind.
translation.it: Ero diventato Jack Kirby, nella mia mente.

translation.en: And to me, that's when the dream came true. Period.
translation.it: Fu l'avverarsi di un sogno, davvero.

translation.en: [DB] Word was spreading about this gritty independent comic.
translation.it: Si sparse la voce di questo oscuro fumetto indipendente.

translation.en: When I first saw Turtles, it really struck me,
translation.it: Rimasi colpito dalle Tartarughe,

translation.en: because it was just really bold.
translation.it: perché osava davvero tanto.

translation.en: You know, they lived in the sewers,
translation.it: Vivevano nelle fogne,

translation.en: and they just had that dark and gritty feel to it.
translation.it: e avevano quest'aria cupa e oscura.

translation.en: Those four words, "teenage," "mutant," "ninja," "turtles,"
translation.it: Quattro parole, tartarughe, ninja, adolescenti, mutanti.

translation.en: you're like, "I've never heard of all that together.
translation.it: E fai "Non le avevo mai sentite insieme.

translation.en: That's clever, I think." It catches your attention.
translation.it: Mica male." Cattura la tua attenzione.

translation.en: [Peter] Issue eight sold a 135,000 copies.
translation.it: Il numero otto vendette 135.000 copie.

translation.en: When it suddenly dawned on me,
translation.it: E all'improvviso mi accorsi

translation.en: I was making more than my wife was, teaching,
translation.it: che guadagnavo più di mia moglie che insegnava,

translation.en: doing my stupid comic book with my friend Kevin.
translation.it: grazie allo stupido fumetto fatto col mio amico Kevin.

translation.en: [DB] Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles was a bona fide hit,
translation.it: Le Tartarughe Ninja furono un enorme successo,

translation.en: at least in comic circles. But all that was about to change.
translation.it: almeno nel giro dei fumetti. Ma le cose stavano per cambiare.

translation.en: But we were then getting nibbles here and there for licensing.
translation.it: Qua e là iniziavano a punzecchiarci per chiedere la licenza.

translation.en: One of those nibblers was Mark Freedman.
translation.it: Uno dei punzecchiatori era Mark Freedman.

translation.en: I think I'm the man behind the Turtles. I might even be the fifth Turtle.
translation.it: Sono l'uomo dietro le Tartarughe, mi sa. Sono quasi la quinta tartaruga.

translation.en: [DB] A renaissance man of sorts, Mark-elangelo was on the lookout for a masterpiece.
translation.it: Quasi un uomo rinascimentale, Mark-elangelo cercava un capolavoro.

translation.en: Mark Freedman was merely a freelance agent,
translation.it: Freedman era un agente freelance che rappresentava

translation.en: representing intellectual properties for different deals.
translation.it: diverse proprietà intellettuali.

translation.en: [Mark] I was looking for an emerging IP
translation.it: Ero in cerca di una proprietà intellettuale emergente

translation.en: that I could take and potentially license to a toy industry.
translation.it: per prenderla e darla in licenza a un'azienda di giocattoli.

translation.en: [DB] Approaching the hottest duo in underground comics,
translation.it: Si avvicinò al duo più in voga dei fumetti underground,

translation.en: to Eastman and Laird, Freedman was the real deal.
translation.it: e per Eastman e Laird, Freedman faceva sul serio.

translation.en: I didn't have a company.
translation.it: Non avevo un'azienda.

translation.en: All I had was a business card, and I worked out of an apartment,
translation.it: Avevo solo un biglietto da visita e lavoravo in casa,

translation.en: and I said, "I've got to make a good impression."
translation.it: dovevo fare una buona impressione.

translation.en: Rent a suit and a shirt with a power tie.
translation.it: Noleggiai camicia, cravatta e completo.

translation.en: Kevin and I were in T-shirts and shorts,
translation.it: Io e Kevin eravamo in t-shirt e pantaloncini, e...

translation.en: and Mark shows up and he's in his three-piece power suit.
translation.it: ...Mark si presentò col suo completo tre pezzi.

translation.en: If this is what an agent is supposed to look like,
translation.it: Un agente di solito si presenta così,

translation.en: I'll play the part.
translation.it: e quindi ho recitato.

translation.en: [DB] A skeptical Eastman and Laird listened
translation.it: Eastman e Laird ascoltarono scettici

translation.en: as the polyester pitchman laid out his plan.
translation.it: il piano del signore vestito di poliestere.

translation.en: I said, "Listen, I wanna be your global licensing agent,
translation.it: Dissi: "Voglio gestire le vostre licenze globali

translation.en: and this is about building a franchise
translation.it: e costruire un franchise

translation.en: that could live in toys and live in entertainment,"
translation.it: che potrebbe tradursi in giochi e intrattenimento", e...

translation.en: and my mind was just wild with ideas.
translation.it: ...avevo un sacco di idee in mente.

translation.en: Well...
translation.it: Beh...

translation.en: [DB] But for Eastman and Laird there was one important deal-breaker.
translation.it: Eastman e Laird avevano una clausola importante.

translation.en: We said, "If you are going out there to talk to people about our characters,
translation.it: Se vai a mostrare in giro i nostri personaggi,

translation.en: we want them to understand
translation.it: vogliamo che si sappia

translation.en: that we will have final say. We will have full control.
translation.it: che l'ultima parola resta a noi.

translation.en: -Okay. -[KE] It was three guys
translation.it: - Ok. - Tre tizi

translation.en: that had a handshake deal. We had a clear understanding.
translation.it: con un patto informale. Ci eravamo capiti.

translation.en: You know, it seemed like, why not?
translation.it: Ci siamo detti, "perché no?"

translation.en: [Mark] Now I have to go into the marketplace
translation.it: Ora dovevo andare sul mercato e convincere

translation.en: and convince some company to take the chance.
translation.it: Ora dovevo andare sul mercato e convincere un produttore a correre il rischio.

translation.en: I needed assets for presentation purposes and they had a foam rubber turtle.
translation.it: Mi servivano oggetti per la presentazione, e loro avevano una tartaruga di gomma.

translation.en: I need it. So the turtle sat in the passenger seat of the car,
translation.it: Mi serviva. Così la tartaruga venne con me in auto,

translation.en: and as I'm driving to New York, people were honking...
translation.it: e mentre andavo a New York, la gente mi suonava:

translation.en: [man's voice] Hey, turtle guy!
translation.it: "Ehi, uomo tartaruga!"

translation.en: [Mark] ...and looking and cracking up.
translation.it: Guardavano e ridevano.

translation.en: And I knew this was gonna be good.
translation.it: Lì capii...che sarebbe andata bene.

translation.en: I think his initial responses were kind of disappointing.
translation.it: Le prime risposte furono un po' deludenti.

translation.en: People would say to me, "Turtles aren't heroic. Forget about it.
translation.it: Mi dicevano: "Le tartarughe non sono eroiche. Lascia stare.

translation.en: And by the way, green will not sell."
translation.it: E poi il verde non vende."

translation.en: You know, what do you say to that?
translation.it: E cosa puoi rispondere?

translation.en: Even the word "ninja"... The definition was "hired assassin."
translation.it: "Ninja", per definizione, significa "sicario su commissione".

translation.en: How am I building a kid's toy line based on hired assassins?
translation.it: Come ci costruisci sopra una linea di giochi per bambini?

translation.en: I went to a company called LJN.
translation.it: Andai da LJN.

translation.en: Jack Friedman, who ran the company, said, "Thanks, but no thanks."
translation.it: Jack Friedman, che gestiva l'azienda, disse "Grazie, ma no, grazie".

translation.en: I was turned down by Jill Barad, the CEO of Mattel,
translation.it: Anche Jill Barad, AD di Mattel, mi rifiutò,

translation.en: saying they'd never work.
translation.it: dicendo che non poteva funzionare.

translation.en: So, lots of naysayers.
translation.it: Ci furono molti "no".

translation.en: [DB] But Hasbro's Kirk Bozigian had a different response.
translation.it: Ma Kirk Bozigian di Hasbro rispose in modo diverso.

translation.en: I think it's kind of cool.
translation.it: Sembra figo!

translation.en: [DB] So he took it upstairs.
translation.it: Quindi andò ai piani alti.

translation.en: My boss looks at me and says,
translation.it: Il mio capo mi guarda e dice,

translation.en: "That's the dumbest idea I've ever seen."
translation.it: "È l'idea più idiota mai vista."

translation.en: So that was my involvement with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.
translation.it: Questo fu il mio coinvolgimento con le Tartarughe.

translation.en: [DB] But Freedman and his rented suit wouldn't be deterred.
translation.it: Ma Freedman e il suo completo a noleggio non si scoraggiarono.

translation.en: I've got to convince the world that this is a great idea.
translation.it: Dovevo convincere il mondo che è una grande idea.

translation.en: So I called up a friend of mine,
translation.it: Perciò chiamai un mio amico,

translation.en: Richard Sallis, who just took a job with a company
translation.it: Richard Sallis, che aveva appena iniziato a lavorare

translation.en: called Playmates Toys.
translation.it: alla Playmates Toys.

translation.en: They were my last resort.
translation.it: Era l'ultima spiaggia.

translation.en: Probably the only resort.
translation.it: Probabilmente l'unica.

translation.en: When I said, "I'm going to send you
translation.it: Gli dissi "Ti manderò...

translation.en: a giant replica," he said, "Okay."
translation.it: ...un modello gigante". E lui: "Ok".

translation.en: So the next day I said, "Richard, did you get the box?"
translation.it: E il giorno dopo gli dissi: "Richard, arrivato il pacco?"

translation.en: He says, "Yeah, it's sitting in my office."
translation.it: E lui: "Sì, è qui in ufficio".

translation.en: I said, "Why didn't you open it?"
translation.it: E io: "Non l'hai aperto?"

translation.en: "Oh, I've been busy with this and that." I said,
translation.it: "Ho avuto cose da fare", e io dissi:

translation.en: "Richard, open the [bleep] box!"
translation.it: "Apri la scatola, c***!"

translation.en: He opens it up.
translation.it: La apre.

translation.en: He gets very quiet.
translation.it: Cala il silenzio.

translation.en: And he says,

translation.en: How do we take these somewhat violent characters

translation.en: from a little black and white comic?

translation.en: It's dark, gritty.

translation.en: [DB] To clean up Eastman and Laird's gore-fest,

translation.it: - Gli piace. - Sì, è il mio forte.

translation.en: First of all, you have four turtles that you can't tell them apart.

translation.en: [DB] But it wasn't as simple as a colored bandana and a belt buckle.

translation.en: Cowabunga, dude!
translation.it: Cowabunga, amico!

translation.en: Pizza time!

translation.en: Let's have the Turtles love pizza.

translation.en: Really, there's a turtle for every kid.

translation.en: It's kind of like The Breakfast Club of action figures.

translation.en: -Who wants cornflakes? -I'm having raisin bran.

translation.en: certain changes sometimes have to be made.

translation.en: had a tail.

translation.en: Because in the original comic book, they had tails,

translation.en: but when they stood up and the tail's hung down, it was...

translation.en: Too phallic-looking.

translation.en: I wasn't thinking that way when I was sculpting it.

translation.en: [Mark] And so...

translation.en: we decided to give him a... [snips]
translation.it: ...decidemmo che...

translation.en: No Turtles had tails after that.

translation.en: [DB] Having made a substantial saving on plastic reduction,

translation.it: e portato in giro per gli USA per mostrarlo a vari compratori.

translation.it: - K-Mart. - Toys "R" Us.

translation.it: - Sears. - Target.

translation.en: We'd say,

translation.en: "You guys are gonna see something that's gonna be
translation.it: "Vedrete qualcosa che diventerà...

translation.en: the greatest action figure line ever."
translation.it: ...la più grande linea di sempre".

translation.it: I negozi rispondevano: "E dov'è?"

translation.en: And in one case, a major retailer kicked us out of the room.
translation.it: In un caso fummo cacciati in malo modo.

translation.en: He said, "Good luck, I have other business."
translation.it: Disse "buona fortuna, ho altri impegni".

translation.it: - Dove dorme il gatto delle Tartarughe? - In una mu-tenda.

translation.en: Ba-dum-pum.
translation.it: Ba-dum-pam.

translation.it: Quello che spiccava

translation.en: was a very serious lack of interest in the toy line.
translation.it: era un grande disinteresse per la linea di giocattoli.

translation.en: The company, at some point, has to start committing to tooling.

translation.en: That didn't happen.

translation.en: We need vehicles for these guys, but our Chinese parent said...

translation.en: -No. -"Not until we know
translation.it: - No. - "Non finché non sapremo

translation.en: you're gonna really sell some."
translation.it: se venderà davvero."

translation.it: Non sapevano come...

translation.en: ...how to market this product.
translation.it: ...pubblicizzare questo prodotto.

translation.en: At that stage, all the money already spent.
translation.it: A quel punto, con tutti i soldi già spesi.

translation.en: TV show, 1.5 million.
translation.it: Un milione e mezzo per il cartone animato.

translation.en: so if we cut the loss,

translation.en: that means it's totally lost.

translation.en: So there was no going back at that point.

translation.en: there wasn't much going forward either.
translation.it: ...sembrava impossibile andare avanti.

translation.it: In quel periodo, più o meno,

translation.en: we hired another toy designer.

translation.en: I'm a toy designer.

translation.en: [DB] But not just any toy designer.
translation.it: E non uno qualsiasi!

translation.en: In fact, if you ask him, he'll tell you.

translation.en: My name is Mark Taylor, and I created He-Man.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Mark Taylor e ho creato He-Man.

translation.en: -[DB] Along with this guy. -Bong.
translation.it: - Insieme a questo tipo. - Bong.

translation.en: -It was Bill Carlson's request... -Yes.
translation.it: - Bill Carlson richiese... - Sì.

translation.en: ...that I be brought in to work on the Turtle line,
translation.it: ...di assumermi per lavorare sulle Tartarughe,

translation.en: 'cause it wasn't going anywhere, with all respect for John.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: I have the power!
translation.it: La grande forza ecco a me!

translation.en: [DB] So now that he had the power at Playmates,
translation.it: E ora che aveva il potere della Playmates,

translation.en: he started making changes...
translation.it: iniziò a cambiare le cose.

translation.en: He-Man style.
translation.it: In stile He-Man.

translation.en: I'm the drawer guy.
translation.it: Sono uno che disegna.

translation.en: [DB] So he took existing designs and redrew them.
translation.it: Quindi prese i design esistenti e li ridisegnò.

translation.en: You know, the party van, it's basically a Volkswagen van, so...
translation.it: Il Party Van era un normale furgoncino Volkswagen, quindi...

translation.en: I made it sexy.
translation.it: ...lo resi sexy.

translation.en: The Foot Clan, it was in the comic book,
translation.it: Il Clan del Piede c'era nel fumetto,

translation.en: so I took it and toy-ized it.
translation.it: quindi lo resi più giocattoloso.

translation.en: I made it kind of zombie-like. I dropped the head down. Big, gangly legs.
translation.it: Li resi degli specie di zombie, con la testa bassa e le gambe lunghe.

translation.en: Scott Hensey was sculpting Shredder.
translation.it: Scott Hensey scolpiva Shredder.

translation.en: In the comic book he was a real tall guy,
translation.it: Nel fumetto era molto alto,

translation.en: and that's the way we wanted him.
translation.it: e volevamo che fosse così.

translation.en: But marketing said he wouldn't fit in the blister pack.
translation.it: Ma non sarebbe entrato nella confezione.

translation.en: So we made him standing that tall and then crouched him over.
translation.it: Quindi lo facemmo alto e poi lo piegammo in avanti.

translation.en: I brought his hands up,
translation.it: Gli alzai le mani

translation.en: so they're kind of making a mystical move.
translation.it: come a fare una sorta di mossa mistica.

translation.en: Like he's getting ready to attack.
translation.it: Come se si preparasse ad attaccare.

translation.en: [DB] He also asked bold questions.
translation.it: Fece anche domande coraggiose.

translation.en: Why does April O'Neil have to be so stupid-looking?
translation.it: Perché Apil O'Neil ha questo aspetto scemo?

translation.en: You know, when I did Teela for He-Man, she was built.
translation.it: Quando feci Teela per He-Man, la disegnai forzuta.

translation.en: [DB] Well, at this point, nothing was built...
translation.it: A questo punto, in realtà, le forze mancavano.

translation.en: in any sense of the word.
translation.it: In tutti i sensi.

translation.en: So while this toy master sunk his claws into Turtles,
translation.it: Mentre il maestro dei giochi affondava gli artigli nelle tartarughe,

translation.en: over at the cartoon studio, they needed help finishing things up.
translation.it: agli studios c'era bisogno di aiuto per concludere il cartone.

translation.en: So they brought in...
translation.it: E chiamarono...

translation.en: The famous Chuck Lorre.
translation.it: Il famoso Chuck Lorre.

translation.en: [DB] Mega-producer Chuck Lorre
translation.it: Il mega produttore Chuck Lorre.

translation.en: is the mastermind behind Dharma & Greg,
translation.it: Cioè la mente dietro Dharma & Greg,

translation.en: Two and a Half Men,
translation.it: Due uomini e mezzo,

translation.en: and all sorts of award-winning hit TV shows.
translation.it: e altri programmi TV di enorme successo.

translation.en: Chuck Lorre, the Big Bang Theory guy!
translation.it: Quello di The Big Bang Theory!

translation.en: [DB] But back then he was a different kind of guy.
translation.it: All'epoca era un'altra persona.

translation.en: I was a traveling journeyman-musician,
translation.it: Ero un musicista itinerante

translation.en: trying to build a career for myself as a songwriter.
translation.it: che cercava di farsi una carriera da cantautore.

translation.en: [DB] With a low budget and a simple idea, Chuck got to work.
translation.it: Con poco budget e una semplice idea, Chuck si mise al lavoro.

translation.en: [Chuck] I was coming from the idea that no one knew these characters.
translation.it: Partii dall'idea che nessuno conosceva i personaggi.

translation.en: So the song was going to be an introduction.
translation.it: La canzone doveva presentarli.

translation.en: The first verse is "Here's who they are."
translation.it: La prima strofa dice "ecco chi sono".

translation.en: ♪ They're the world's most fearsome fighting team ♪
translation.it: La squadra di guerrieri più temibile al mondo

translation.en: "We're really hip."
translation.it: "Siamo proprio fighi".

translation.en: Whenever there's something spoken, that's actually Chuck.
translation.it: Nelle parti cantate, la voce è di Chuck.

translation.en: ♪ They're heroes in a half shell and they're green ♪
translation.it: Eroi verdi e col guscio

translation.en: "Hey, get a grip!"
translation.it: Ehi, dateci dentro!

translation.en: ♪ Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles ♪
translation.it: Tartarughe Ninja

translation.en: -"Heroes in a half shell." -"Turtle power." Hey!
translation.it: - Eroi col guscio. - Potere alle tartarughe!

translation.en: Literature.
translation.it: Letteratura.

translation.en: [DB] Chuck Lorre's infectious jingle...
translation.it: Il jingle contagioso di Chuck...

translation.en: Thank you, Chuck.
translation.it: Grazie, Chuck.

translation.en: [DB] ...and the rest of the five-part pilot mini-series,
translation.it: ...e il resto dei cinque episodi pilota...

translation.en: quietly began airing on December 28th, 1987.
translation.it: ...iniziarono le trasmissioni il 28 dicembre 1987.

translation.en: And back at Playmates,
translation.it: E alla Playmates,

translation.en: the team was working double time to catch up.
translation.it: si lavorava senza sosta per mettersi a pari.

translation.en: I'll be cranking out the work.
translation.it: Lavoravo come un matto.

translation.en: [DB] Good, because...
translation.it: Bene, perché...

translation.en: The show had already debuted,
translation.it: Lo show era già iniziato,

translation.en: so there was some interest in Turtles,
translation.it: quindi c'era interesse per le Tartarughe.

translation.en: but we still had to prove ourselves.
translation.it: Ma dovevamo ancora dimostrare il nostro valore.

translation.en: [DB] With only five TV episodes and an incomplete toy line,
translation.it: Con appena cinque episodi trasmessi e una linea incompleta di giochi

translation.en: it's hard to imagine who would stick their neck out
translation.it: chi mai avrebbe rischiato il guscio

translation.en: for these strange misshapen animals.
translation.it: per questi strani animali deformi?

translation.en: -Me, of course. -[DB] Geoffrey the Giraffe?
translation.it: - Io, ovvio! - Geoffrey la Giraffa?

translation.en: [Karl] Toys "R" Us was known as the retailer that would support everything.
translation.it: Toys "R" Us era il negozio di giochi che sosteneva tutto.

translation.en: -[DB] Everything? -Everything.
translation.it: - Tutto? - Tutto.

translation.en: [DB] If Toys "R" Us came on board,
translation.it: Se Toys "R" Us saliva a bordo,

translation.en: Playmates would finally be able to compete with the biggies!
translation.it: Playmates avrebbe potuto competere con i pezzi grossi.

translation.en: [thinking] The biggies...
translation.it: I pezzi grossi...

translation.en: So I said, "Go ahead and produce...
translation.it: Quindi dissi: "Va bene, tirate fuori

translation.en: the 6,000 pieces."
translation.it: i seimila pezzi ordinati."

translation.en: [DB] Despite the small order,
translation.it: L'ordine era ridotto,

translation.en: Playmates got to work.
translation.it: ma si misero al lavoro.

translation.en: We've got the four Turtles and we got Splinter.
translation.it: Abbiamo quattro tartarughe e Splinter.

translation.en: Of course, Shredder.
translation.it: E Shredder, ovvio.

translation.en: And April O'Neil.
translation.it: E April O'Neil.

translation.en: April O'Neil still stinks.
translation.it: Che faceva ancora schifo.

translation.en: There's Bebop and Rocksteady and the Foot Clan:
translation.it: Bebop, Rocksteady e il Clan del Piede.

translation.en: Throwaway, bad-guy soldiers.
translation.it: Soldati cattivi usa e getta.

translation.en: [DB] So, in June 1988,
translation.it: Così, nel giugno del 1988,

translation.en: ten figures and five vehicles were shipped...
translation.it: dieci figure e cinque veicoli partirono...

translation.en: to Toys "R" Us.
translation.it: verso Toys "R" Us.

translation.en: See what happens.
translation.it: E vediamo come va.

translation.en: [DB] But they didn't have long to wait,
translation.it: L'attesa non fu lunga.

translation.en: because very soon Toys "R" Us called with a re-order.
translation.it: In poco tempo, Toy "R" Us piazzò un nuovo ordine.

translation.en: Re-order is 50,000.
translation.it: Ne ordinarono 50.000.

translation.en: We were selling like crazy.
translation.it: Vendevamo da pazzi.

translation.en: [Karl] This was the one case in my career
translation.it: Fu l'unico caso della mia carriera

translation.en: where I literally walked into a retail store
translation.it: in cui entrai in un negozio

translation.en: and saw the shelves bare.
translation.it: e trovai gli scaffali vuoti.

translation.en: No Turtle on the shelf.
translation.it: Niente tartarughe sugli scaffali.

translation.en: And so I went to a second store.
translation.it: Così andai in un altro negozio.

translation.en: No Turtle on the shelf.
translation.it: Niente tartarughe sugli scaffali.

translation.en: -And I went to a third store. -[DB] Well, you get the idea.
translation.it: - E andai in un terzo. - Avete capito.

translation.en: Yeah, we knew we had a phenomenon on our hands.
translation.it: Sapevamo di avere un fenomeno.

translation.en: ♪ Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles ♪
translation.it: Tartarughe Ninja!

translation.en: [voiceover] From Playmates!
translation.it: Da Playmates!

translation.en: I'm 11 years old at the time
translation.it: Avevo 11 anni, all'epoca.

translation.en: and I see this strange toy.
translation.it: E vidi questo giocattolo strano.

translation.en: It had a shell,
translation.it: Aveva un guscio,

translation.en: and it had this belt
translation.it: e aveva una cintura

translation.en: with different weapons shoved in each loop and I said, "Whoa,
translation.it: con varie armi infilate dentro, e dissi: "Wow.

translation.en: what in the world is that?"
translation.it: Ma che diavolo è?"

translation.en: Those ten action figures, released in the first wave, are so iconic.
translation.it: Le dieci action figure della prima edizione sono iconiche.

translation.en: There's a certain whimsy to them
translation.it: Trasudano un livello di fantasia

translation.en: that isn't obvious in any other major action figure line of that time.
translation.it: che non traspare da nessun'altra linea di action figure del periodo.

translation.en: There's something fun about these figures.
translation.it: Hanno un che di divertente.

translation.en: Cowabunga, dudes!
translation.it: Cowabunga, amici!

translation.en: [DB] The Turtles had gone from underground oddity
translation.it: IL 1988: L'ANNO DELLA TARTARUGA Le tartarughe avevano lasciato la scena underground per il successo.

translation.en: to overnight sensation.
translation.it: Le tartarughe avevano lasciato la scena underground per il successo.

translation.en: [commentator] The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
translation.it: Le Tartarughe Ninja

translation.en: are the top-selling action figures in the toy business.
translation.it: sono le action figure più vendute nel settore.

translation.en: [DB] Taking Playmates along for the ride,
translation.it: E Playmates volava con loro.

translation.en: straight to the top.
translation.it: Fino alla vetta.

translation.en: Those cost us about one million dollars. [laughs]
translation.it: Questi ci costarono un milione di dollari circa.

translation.en: [DB] But the newest biggie on the block
translation.it: Ma gli ultimi arrivati

translation.en: wasn't the only one
translation.it: non erano i soli...

translation.en: seeing green.
translation.it: ...a vederci verde.

translation.en: They were big checks. [laughs]
translation.it: Grossi assegni, sì.

translation.en: That first big check, which I think was a little over a million dollars...
translation.it: Il primo assegno grosso, mi pare fu poco di un milione...

translation.en: To have a check in your hand that you're gonna put in your account
translation.it: Avere in mano un assegno che verserai sul tuo conto

translation.en: that's for that much money is...
translation.it: e che vale quei soldi...

translation.en: [KE] Kudos to Mark Freedman, who coached us very well in that.
translation.it: Mark Freedman ci aveva istruiti bene.

translation.en: "When you get money, save it and invest it, or put it away."
translation.it: "I soldi investiteli o metteteli da parte."

translation.en: Did Kevin tell you one of the first things he bought was a tank?
translation.it: Kevin vi ha detto che comprò un carrarmato?

translation.en: [KE] An M15A Stuart light tank.
translation.it: Un carrarmato leggero M154 Stuart.

translation.en: We used to have big paintball wars. I'd just hide in my tank and...
translation.it: Giocavamo a paintball. Mi nascondevo nel carro e...

translation.en: [DB] While Eastman took cover in his half shell,
translation.it: Mentre Eastman si riparava nel suo guscio,

translation.en: Mark Freedman was launching an offensive
translation.it: Mark Freedman lanciava un'offensiva

translation.en: on an entirely different front.
translation.it: su un fronte completamente diverso.

translation.en: I wanted to offer the fans something bigger and better.
translation.it: Volevo dare ai fan qualcosa di più grande e migliore.

translation.en: I wanted to do a live action feature film.
translation.it: Volevo fare un film d'azione dal vivo.

translation.en: -[DB] Great idea! -[cheering]
translation.it: Ottima idea!

translation.en: -[DB] Or not. -[boos]
translation.it: Oppure no.

translation.en: We've seen a lot of movies
translation.it: Abbiamo visto molti film in cui...

translation.en: where comic book characters are taken into live action,
translation.it: ...vengono adattati dei fumetti.

translation.en: and it's just so terrible.
translation.it: E sono tremendi.

translation.en: [DB] The idea ruffled Playmates' feathers too.
translation.it: L'idea non piaceva neanche a Playmates.

translation.en: They felt I was rocking the boat. We already have a successful TV series.
translation.it: Pensavano che osassi troppo. Avevamo una serie di successo.

translation.en: Everything is humming along, it's perfect, making money.
translation.it: Andava tutto bene, si facevano bei soldi.

translation.en: But I know from business, if you sit still, you die.
translation.it: Ma so che negli affari se ti fermi muori.

translation.en: You have to go forward.
translation.it: Devi andare avanti.

translation.en: [DB] Mark Freedman moved his idea forward, to Golden Harvest Pictures.
translation.it: E Mark Freedman andò avanti, e si rivolse alla Golden Harvest Pictures.

translation.en: We have the best stunt guys in the world.
translation.it: Abbiamo i migliori stuntmen al mondo.

translation.en: All we have to do is put four guys in our stunt suits.
translation.it: Ci bastavano quattro dei nostri in tuta da stunt.

translation.en: Awesome!
translation.it: Fantastico!

translation.en: And also, I have Jim Henson.
translation.it: E avevo anche Jim Henson.

translation.en: -[DB] The maestro of Muppets himself? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Il maestro dei Muppet in persona? - Già.

translation.en: -Cowabunga! -[bell rings]
translation.it: Cowabunga!

translation.en: [DB] It was starting to look like Mark's idea would work out after all.
translation.it: Sembrava che l'idea di Mark avrebbe funzionato, in fondo.

translation.en: Yeah, well so far, my track record's been batting a thousand.
translation.it: Il mio record andava alla grande.

translation.en: [DB] And sure enough, he'd get his chance
translation.it: E avrebbe avuto la possibilità

translation.en: to make the naysayers at Playmates eat crow-topped pizza.
translation.it: di far ingoiare agli scettici di Playmates il rospo...con la pizza.

translation.en: The movie gets completed
translation.it: Il film è pronto.

translation.en: and we have a screening for the folks of Playmates Toys
translation.it: Lo mostriamo ai tipi di Playmates Toys.

translation.en: and Richard Sallis came up to me
translation.it: Richard Sallis venne da me, e...

translation.en: and politely looked at me in the face, said to me,
translation.it: Richard Sallis venne da me, e... ...mi guardò educatamente e mi disse:

translation.en: "Well, you [bleep] that up, Freedman."
translation.it: "Beh, fa proprio ca**re, Freedman".

translation.en: We thought we were in trouble.
translation.it: Credevamo di essere nei guai.

translation.en: The TV show was very light-hearted and bright. This was...
translation.it: Il cartone era allegro e spensierato. Questo era...

translation.en: ...the polar opposite.
translation.it: ...l'esatto opposto.

translation.en: [MF] Of course, when I walked out, I said, "Holy [bleep], what did I just do?"
translation.it: Quando sono uscito, mi sono detto: "Porca p***, che cos'ho fatto?"

translation.en: There goes the property.
translation.it: Tanti saluti alla proprietà.

translation.en: [DB] Things were looking dark
translation.it: C'era pessimismo,

translation.en: when Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles hit theaters in March of 1990.
translation.it: quando Tartarughe Ninja alla riscossa uscì nelle sale a marzo 1990.

translation.en: [MF] Needless to say, the film opened up and...
translation.it: Inutile dire che il film uscì in sala e...

translation.en: it broke all records.
translation.it: ...battè ogni record.

translation.en: We ended up at $134 million.
translation.it: SI TIFA PER LE TARTARUGHE Arrivammo a 134 milioni.

translation.en: The biggest indie film of all time at that point.
translation.it: Il più grande film indipendente di tutti i tempi. TRIONFO AL BOTTEGHINO

translation.en: I now call up Playmates.
translation.it: Chiamai... ...Playmates. Dissi:

translation.en: I said, "How're the toy sales this weekend, guys?"
translation.it: ...Playmates. Dissi: "Come vanno le vendite, ora?"

translation.en: No Turtle on the shelf.
translation.it: Niente tartarughe sugli scaffali.

translation.en: Sold out. Everywhere.
translation.it: Tutto esaurito. Ovunque.

translation.en: Oops!
translation.it: Ops!

translation.en: [DB] With Ninja Turtles: The Movie breaking box office records,
translation.it: Mentre il film infrangeva tutti i record in sala,

translation.en: Playmates' profits continued to mutate.
translation.it: i profitti di Playmates crescevano.

translation.en: -We sold 100 million units just in 1990. -[cash register rings]
translation.it: Vendemmo 100 milioni di unità solo nel 1990.

translation.en: We owned 80% of the boys' space.
translation.it: Avevamo l'80% del mercato per ragazzini.

translation.en: Everyday is Christmas sales.
translation.it: Vendevamo come a Natale, tutto l'anno.

translation.en: [DB] Kids were Casey Jones-ing for more.
translation.it: E i bambini ne volevano sempre di più.

translation.en: [TV] Casey Jones, the sports warrior!
translation.it: Casey Jones, guerriero sportivo!

translation.en: [DB] And if Playmates wanted to meet the demand,
translation.it: E se Playmates voleva soddisfare la domanda,

translation.en: they'd have to use their brains.
translation.it: doveva usare...il cervello.

translation.en: We have to have a new character every month.
translation.it: Ci serviva un personaggio nuovo al mese.

translation.en: [TV] Introducing Leatherhead!
translation.it: Ecco a voi Leatherhead!

translation.en: There was a guy who we decided to call Pizza Face.
translation.it: C'era un tizio che avevamo deciso di chiamare Pizza Face.

translation.en: New.
translation.it: Nuovo.

translation.en: [Scott] And also Ray Fillet.
translation.it: E c'era Ray Fillet.

translation.en: [Scott] General Traag.
translation.it: Il generale Traag.

translation.en: New.
translation.it: Nuovo.

translation.en: [Scott] Mutagen Man.
translation.it: Mutagen Man.

translation.en: And we did a giant mosquito.
translation.it: C'era pure una zanzara gigante.

translation.en: Yeah, they were going by pretty fast.
translation.it: Sì, vendevano parecchio.

translation.en: [DB] But if you're one of those thinking...
translation.it: Ma se siete di quelli che dicono...

translation.en: I've always been a play set guy.
translation.it: Io amo i set di gioco.

translation.en: [DB] ...Playmates didn't leave you hanging. In fact...
translation.it: ...Playmates sapeva cosa fare.

translation.en: There were two major play sets.
translation.it: - E in effetti... - C'erano due grossi set.

translation.en: The sewer play set was the headquarters for the Turtles and Splinter.
translation.it: Quello delle fognature, con il quartier generale delle Tartarughe.

translation.en: It was dual tiered so you could have a street-level play set
translation.it: Era a due piani, un set a livello della strada...

translation.en: and an underground play set. Unbelievable.
translation.it: ...e uno nel sottosuolo. Incredibile.

translation.en: And then the Technodrome was the villain's play set.
translation.it: E il Technodrome era il set del cattivo.

translation.en: It was this big, huge ball with an eye mounted on top on tank treads.
translation.it: Era una grossa palla con un occhio in cima e i cingoli di un carrarmato.

translation.en: And it would unfold and open up with a jail in the middle.
translation.it: Si apriva, e in mezzo c'era una prigione.

translation.en: When I saw it the first time, I thought...
translation.it: Quando lo vidi la prima volta, pensai...

translation.en: "I'm gonna buy that [bleep] thing."
translation.it: ..."Io la compro, c***."

translation.en: [DB] But that didn't mean the Turtles themselves got crowded out of the party.
translation.it: Ma non per questo le Tartarughe erano state messe da parte.

translation.en: As we started expanding the Turtle line, instead of just four naked turtles,
translation.it: Ampliando la linea, invece di avere quattro tartarughe nude,

translation.en: we started integrating different themes.
translation.it: abbiamo incorporato temi diversi.

translation.en: Sports, samurai,
translation.it: Sport, samurai,

translation.en: -space. -[TV voiceover] T minus ten.
translation.it: - spazio. - Meno dieci.

translation.en: It's one of the biggest toy lines ever,
translation.it: È una delle linee più grandi al mondo!

translation.en: mainly because they just kept releasing the same four figures
translation.it: Specie perché continuavano a far uscire le stesse quattro figure

translation.en: with different outfits.
translation.it: con abiti diversi.

translation.en: So we'll have Hip-hop Turtle, and monster Turtles.
translation.it: Avevamo le tartarughe hip-hop, o quelle mostruose.

translation.en: Backflip Turtles.
translation.it: Salto all'indietro...

translation.en: They even had Turtle Trolls.
translation.it: I Troll delle Tartarughe!

translation.en: I loved those. I mean, they were so ugly, they were cute.
translation.it: Li adoravo. Erano così brutti da essere carini.

translation.en: I hated them.
translation.it: Li odiavo.

translation.en: Star Trek Turtles... I think Donatello had Vulcan ears.
translation.it: Tartarughe Star Trek. Donatello aveva orecchie da vulcaniano, credo.

translation.en: Caveman Turtles, Western Turtles.
translation.it: Tartarughe cavernicole. Tartarughe western.

translation.en: The transforming Turtle,
translation.it: Quella trasformista,

translation.en: that goes from pet turtle to Ninja Turtle.
translation.it: che da tartaruga normale diventa ninja.

translation.en: Caveman Turtle. What about, you know, Western Turtle?
translation.it: Tartarughe Cavernicole. E poi western. E poi...

translation.en: Wait, I just said-- I said--
translation.it: Ho appena detto...

translation.en: -Whatever. -The whole point is, yeah.
translation.it: - Vabbè, comunque. - Il fatto è, sì.

translation.en: I can't keep track of this.
translation.it: Non ci sto dietro.

translation.en: [DB] Well then, we'd better move on to movie Turtles.
translation.it: Beh, passiamo alle Tartarughe del film.

translation.en: Wait, Playmates didn't make any?
translation.it: Come? Non ne hanno fatte?

translation.en: Not for the first movie. -[DB] Why not? -Um...
translation.it: - Non per il primo film. - Perché no?

translation.en: Because they weren't interested in supporting such a violent film.
translation.it: Perché non erano interessati a sostenere un film così violento.

translation.en: [DB] Oh yeah. Well maybe they should come up with a new movie.
translation.it: Ah, sì. Beh, allora sarà il caso di inventarsene un altro.

translation.en: We came up with a story, "The Secret of the Ooze."
translation.it: Ci inventammo una storia: Il Segreto di Ooze.

translation.en: We quickly put a product line together for the second movie,
translation.it: Mettemmo assieme una linea per il secondo film,

translation.en: and that did gangbusters.
translation.it: e andò alla grande.

translation.en: -Hold up! -Where is the Vanilla Ice action figure?
translation.it: - Aspetta! - E Vanilla Ice?

translation.en: -That's what I wanna know. -[DB] Don't worry. Here he is!

translation.en: I can look back, it was the height of the Turtles,
translation.it: - È bello vederti. - Se ci ripenso... Le Tartarughe erano al picco, Peter ha otto anni più di me.

translation.en: Peter is eight years older than I am.
translation.it: Le Tartarughe erano al picco, Peter ha otto anni più di me.

translation.en: He's very settled in his life. I'm 23 years old.
translation.it: Si era sistemato. Io avevo 23 anni.

translation.en: I have a little bit of cash, and I'm single.
translation.it: Avevo qualche soldo ed ero single.

translation.en: Wasn't this done for the first toy fair?
translation.it: Questo fu fatto per la prima fiera, no?

translation.en: Oh, yeah. That's right. Beginning of '88.
translation.it: Sì! È vero. A inizio dell'88.

translation.en: I pushed him away because I was younger
translation.it: Lo allontanai perché ero più giovane

translation.en: and I wanted to do other things and I had a whole...
translation.it: e volevo fare altre cose e c'era...

translation.en: A whole world I wanted to see.
translation.it: ...tutto un mondo da vedere.

translation.en: -We had that window installed. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Avevamo installato quella finestra. - Già.

translation.en: Because our big idea was,
translation.it: Perché l'idea era

translation.en: we'd each have a drawing table next to the window.
translation.it: di avere entrambi un tavolo con finestra.

translation.en: -I'd be in the other room, you'd be here. -Yep.
translation.it: - Io sarei stato di là e tu qui. - Sì.

translation.en: And we'd literally pass pages through the window.
translation.it: Per passarci le tavole attraverso la finestra.

translation.en: It never happened.
translation.it: Non accadde mai.

translation.en: Everywhere we are in our relationship now is because of what I did to it.
translation.it: Se oggi il nostro rapporto è così, è per ciò che ho fatto io.

translation.en: Hindsight being 20/20,
translation.it: Col senno di poi...

translation.en: I'd have done a lot more things differently, back in those days.
translation.it: ...avrei agito molto diversamente, all'epoca.

translation.en: Those days, I look back on them very fondly.
translation.it: Ripenso a quei giorni con grande affetto.

translation.en: Cowabunga. Wow, what is that from?
translation.it: Cowabunga. Da dove viene?

translation.en: Really, at that point, we were interested in having fun drawing.
translation.it: All'epoca volevamo divertirci disegnando.

translation.en: We were Turtle dads.
translation.it: Eravamo Tarta-papà.

translation.en: We enjoyed our kids, we took great care of our kids.
translation.it: Ci piacevano i nostri bimbi, ce ne prendevamo cura.

translation.en: And they've been adopted by someone else.
translation.it: E li ha adottati qualcun altro.

translation.en: I inked a certain character. You inked certain characters.
translation.it: Io ho inchiostrato alcuni personaggi, tu altri.

translation.en: [Peter] But I made it a point in the negotiations with Viacom,
translation.it: Durante le trattative, ho preteso... ...di poter tornare ad autopubblicare il fumetto delle Tartarughe,

translation.en: to retain the rights to self-publish the Turtle comic
translation.it: ...di poter tornare ad autopubblicare il fumetto delle Tartarughe,

translation.en: if I so desired.
translation.it: se avessi voluto.

translation.en: I just couldn't live without that possibility in my life.
translation.it: Non potevo vivere senza avere quella possibilità.

translation.en: And you know, maybe someday we'll do it again.
translation.it: E chissà, forse un giorno lo rifaremo.

translation.en: [DB] Time will tell,
translation.it: Il tempo ci dirà

translation.en: if we'll see Eastman and Laird return to where it all started.
translation.it: se Eastman e Laird torneranno dove tutto ebbe inizio.

translation.en: Just two guys making each other laugh.
translation.it: Due tizi che si fanno ridere a vicenda.

translation.en: And inking each other's pencils.
translation.it: Che si inchiostrano le matite a vicenda.

translation.en: [Peter] It would be a nice,
translation.it: Sarebbe un bel modo...

translation.en: circling around way back to the beginning,
translation.it: ...di tornare agli inizi,

translation.en: where Kevin and I did those original Turtle comics together.
translation.it: quando io e Kevin disegnammo il fumetto originale insieme.

translation.en: And I miss that.
translation.it: Mi manca.

translation.en: Are you gonna pencil your favorite Turtle or ink it?
translation.it: La tua Tartaruga la disegni o la inchiostri?

translation.en: Pencil it. No wait, I'm drawing Raphatello or Donanardo?
translation.it: Disegno. No aspetta, sto facendo Rafatello o Donanardo?
